婓字的基本解释

婓
fēi
〔婓婓〕往来不停的样子。
丑貌。

婓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēi］
［《廣韻》芳非切，平微，敷。］
亦作“婔1”。
(1)见“婓婓”。
(2)同“妃1”。

婓字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　婓； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页264第26
【廣韻】芳非切【集韻】【韻會】符非切，?音肥。【說文】婓婓，往來貌。【揚雄·反騷】昔仲尼之去魯兮，婓婓遲遲而周邁。　又【集韻】芳微切，音霏。【左思·蜀都賦】娉江婓與神遊。【註】江婓，神女也。遊于江濱，鄭交甫遇而挑之，婓解佩以贈。

婓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
婓字的起名意思

同"妃"。

婓
Basic explanation of words
婓
fēi
[婓婓] It looks like it's not stopping.
Ugly.
婓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [fēi]
["Guang Yun" Fang Fei cut, flat and small, apply. ]
Also known as "婔1".
(1) See "婓婓".
(2) Same as "Concubine 1".
婓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　婓; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 264 26
[Guang Yun] Fang Feiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Fu Feiqie,? Yinfei. [Speaking text] 婓婓, the appearance of each other. [Yang Xiong·Anti-Sao] Xi Zhongni went to Lu Xi, but he was too late to go.　[Jiyun] Fang is slightly cut, and the sound is Fei. 【Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu】Ping Jiang Mi and Wandering in Wonderland. [Note] Jiang Wei, Goddess is also. Swim in the riverside, Zheng Jiaofu picks it up when encountering it, and gives it away as a gift.
